title: download always failed
content: i need some help with my firefox browser. all of a sudden my firefox browser wont download any files from anywhere but if i try to use the save image as on an image firefox would download them. weirdest thing is other browsers are fine when downloading files.

title: Log in
content:
I can not log in to Outlook anymore on my computer when I use Firefox, but it is possible when I use Edge. But I prefer Firefox. What to do about this?

Billy
creator: billylarsson

title: Non è possibile personalizzare i link nella nuova TAB
content:
Ho impostato il browser per aprire la nuova TAB sulla "Firefox Home", dove ho una serie di link salvati.

Una volta era possibile modificarli, rimuoverli e altro.

Ora, ovunque io metta il mouse, NON compaiono i tre puntini che dovrebbero dare accesso al menu.

Come posso fare per modificare i link in questa pagina?
creator: mtassinari

title: Having a trouble to download with firefox's download
content: Didn't have this problem before but after a couple days ago, I didn't know what changes happened to my computer but most of the program wouldn't work except I have to run it as administrator. The download problem occurred when suddenly my FF always froze no matter if I closed it or not. So I just refresh my FF and copy my profile from the old backup data that FF generated and just pasted all of them on my new profile. The problem is that after I tries to download warcraft 3 maps from google drive, the download always occurs as failed. I don't have this problem when I tried it with Edge. Running FF as admin doesn't worked either. Neither as when I run FF as refresh without any extension. Downloading stuffs with IDM (Internet Download Manager) does not have any problems. Just now, I try to download a .xlsx files from my workplace websites. After I click on the download or the file itself, nothing occurs as if nothing happened. This is giving me a headaches so I came here to give it a try if anyone can help me fix this problem.
creator: twz.lotus15

title: SEC_ERROR_REVOKED_CERTIFICATE
content:
Cuando intento log in a https://clientes.fenieenergia.es/areaclientes/s/login/, siempre recibo Secure Connection Failed

An error occurred during a connection to clientes.fenieenergia.es. Peer’s Certificate has been revoked.

Error code: SEC_ERROR_REVOKED_CERTIFICATE 

   The page you are trying to view cannot be shown because the authenticity of the received data could not be verified.    Please contact the website owners to inform them of this problem.

He limpiado los cookies, pero el problema sigue Gracias
creator: jmulet50

title: mylotto.co.nz is blocking Firefox browser and has been for months
content: The website mylotto.co.nz has been blocking Firefox for many months now and when I rang them to find out what the problem is they just say they are having problems but it was obvious that the person there was reading a script and fobbing me off. This has been going for many months now a problem would have been fixed by now. I would like to know if you can bring pressure to bear on them to get reinstated again. I have attached a screenshot of the message from their site. Thanking you. Murray
creator: murjan5

title: Firefox Browser Defaults to the Wrong Time Zone
content: I've seen a few submissions describing the same or similar issues, but is there a consistent, effective way of changing the time zone in Firefox? It keeps defaulting to the wrong time zone (despite everything else on my system displaying the correct time zone) and has been doing so for weeks. Solutions appreciated!
creator: linsilver888

title: 126.0.1 (64-bit)  so many problems
content:
I have been using Firefox for years without any problem but 126.0.1 (64-bit) is making me to consider stopping it. I am having issues playing live cams, getting some websites running properly, authentication issues, etc...etc..

Why?

title: GIFs "saving as" webp only
content: Up until a month ago, I was able to download gifs from the giphy.com as actual GIFs. What has changed in Firefox and how can I troubleshoot this so I can get the desired file format of GIF?
